name: Tea Candle Holder Wake Robin Wildflower
description:
This gorgeous candle holder I made with Wake Robin red Trillium wildflower is one of few you will see for this season. I only collect a few here and there to protect the populations. They add a woodsy, rustic glow to any room. Trillium are found in shaded woodlands. These came from an area near White Top Mountain (the highest peak in Virginia) in Grayson County. Line them up in a sunny window sill for a splendid effect.

Heavy Duty Glass holder. Each one comes signed by me the artist.

Each candle holder unique with different flowers and ferns touch of nature to any room or decor. I hand pick the flowers myself, dry and press them to make a beautiful work of art. The flowers are arranged in a natural array and then covered with decoupage over paper.

These holders are made to hold either votive candles or tea light candles, but tea lights are recommended to give the glowing effect. Candle holder measures 2" height by 2-2/8 width, with thick high-quality glass.

An ALL-Natural, ECO friendly Soy Tea light candle (unscented) is included, so you may enjoy the wonderful natural ambiance right away.These candles are made by http://www.etsy.com/shop/sinfullysoycandles. You can reorder your candles with her!heavy duty glass holder, fern, paper, eco friendly soy candle

To clean, wipe with a slightly damp soft cloth. Do not submerge into water.

name: Tea Candle Holder Wild Geranium Wildflowers
description:
I created this gorgeous tea or votive candle holder with pressed Wild Geraniums from Grayson County, Virginia. These wildflowers are very common and have wonderful blue/purple color and unique leaf pattern. It has a beautiful glows in the warmth of the candle's flame. Try putting this candle holder on the window sill and see the beauty as the light shines through it. Line up several in a row for a wonderful effect.

Heavy Duty Glass holder. Each one comes signed by me the artist.

Each candle holder unique with different flowers and ferns touch of nature to any room or decor. I hand pick the flowers myself, dry and press them to make a beautiful work of art. The flowers are arranged in a natural array and then covered with decoupage over paper.

These holders are made to hold either votive candles or tea light candles, but tea lights are recommended to give the glowing effect. Candle holder measures 2" height by 2-2/8 width, with thick high-quality glass.

An ALL-Natural, ECO friendly Soy Tea light candle (unscented) is included, so you may enjoy the wonderful natural ambiance right away.These candles are made by http://www.etsy.com/shop/sinfullysoycandles. You can reorder your candles with her!heavy duty glass holder, fern, paper, eco friendly soy candle


To clean, wipe with a slightly damp soft cloth. Do not submerge into water.

name: Tea Candle Holder Sweet Yellow Clover Wildflowers
description:
I arranged a nice floral pattern with Sweet Yellow Clover to make this tea light candle holder. It's a simple beauty with a touch of buttery yellow. Sweet Yellow Clover is often used by bees to make a delicious honey. Try placing in a window sill on a sunny day, or collecting all of the fern candle holders. These look great in a rustic cabin, patio, or any room in your house.

Heavy Duty Glass holder.

Each candle holder unique with different flowers and different hues to add a touch of nature to any room or decor. I hand pick the flowers myself, dry and press them to make a beautiful work of art. The flowers are arranged in a natural array and then covered with decoupage with tinted paper.

These holders are made to hold either votive candles or tea light candles, but tea lights are recommended to give the glowing effect. Candle holder measures 2" height by 2-2/8 width, with thick high-quality glass.

An ALL-Natural, ECO friendly Soy Tea light candle (unscented) is included, so you may enjoy the wonderful natural ambiance right away.These candles are made by http://www.etsy.com/shop/sinfullysoycandles. You can reorder your candles with her!

name: Tea Candle Holder Ebony Fern
description:
I created this delicate candle holder with Ebony Spleenwort fern. Ebony spleenwort grows on shaded banks through the East coast. This is a common fern that has a lovely glow. Try placing in a window sill on a sunny day, or collecting all of the fern candle holders. These look great in a rustic cabin, patio, or any room in your house.

Heavy Duty Glass holder.

Each candle holder unique with different wildflowers or ferns a touch of nature to any room or decor. I hand pick the flowers myself, dry and press them to make a beautiful work of art. The flowers are arranged in a natural arrangement and then covered with decoupage.

These holders are made to hold either votive candles or tea light candles, but tea lights are recommended to give the glowing effect. Candle holder measures 2" height by 2-2/8 width, with thick high-quality glass.

An ALL-Natural, ECO friendly Soy Tea light candle (unscented) is included, so you may enjoy the wonderful natural ambiance right away.
